Doreen Sibanda bụ onye Zimbabwe a mụrụ na UK, onye nlekọta na onye nchịkwa nka
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke National Gallery of Zimbabwe kemgbe afọ 2004
A mụrụ Sibanda na United Kingdom nye na nne na nna Jamaica
Nne na nna ya gbara ya ume ịhọrọ ọrụ na Education dị ka onye nkuzi nka
E gosipụtara ọrụ Doreen Sibanda na ọtụtụ mba dị iche iche dịka Czech Republic, Russia na Zimbabwe
Nke a mere ka ọ kwaga Zimbabwe n'afọ 1981–88, na-arụ ọrụ nchịkwa na National Gallery of Zimbabwe dị ka onye ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ mbụ ya.

Sibanda edeela ma dezie ọtụtụ akwụkwọ, gụnyere Zimbabwe Stone Sculpture: A retrospective, 1957-2004, The Zimbabwe Integrated Teacher Education Course (1982), na Mawonero: Modern and Contemporary Art in Zimbabwe (2015).
